back_cards.example_en: I do push-ups to strengthen my arms.

back_cards.definition_en: To improve or enhance a skill.
back_cards.example_en: Sheâ€™s taking classes to strengthen her coding skills.

back_cards.definition_en: To reinforce a relationship or bond.
back_cards.example_en: They worked together to strengthen their friendship.
His support helped strengthen my determination.

back_cards.definition_en: To fortify a structure or system.
back_cards.example_en: The city plans to strengthen the bridge.
